data.actual_result: The 2FA verification window disappears once the app is reopened and the login process has to be started all over again
data.expected_result: The 2FA verification window should remain open
data.short_description: 2FA login screen disappears when exiting the app
data.steps_to_repro: - Have 2FA enabled for your account - Go to User Setting and log out of your account by clicking the Log Out button in the top right corner of your display - Enter your Discord email address and password and hit the login button - Exit the app by pressing the home button (do not close it entirely) and go grab your Authy or Google Authenticator code - Reopen the app and notice that the 2FA verification window is gone and the login process has to be started all over again
